sentence.Network_en: These files have been zipped up to take up less disk space.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些文档已经进行了压缩，以节省磁盘空间。

sentence.Network_en: He is lined up for no less than four US television interviews.
sentence.Network_cn: 多达4家美国电视媒体排期邀请他上节目接受采访。

sentence.Network_en: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room.
sentence.Network_cn: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to introduce something as being even less likely or suitable than something else already mentioned
jx.jx_cn_mean: ［表示比刚刚说过的事更不可能或更不适合］更不要说

lj.lj_ly: what woman would consider a date with him, much less a marriage?.
lj.lj_ls: 什么样的女人愿意跟他约会，更不要说嫁给他了？。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to suggest, often ironically, that something is surprising or impressive
jx.jx_cn_mean: ［用于表示某事令人惊讶或给人留下深刻印象，常为讽刺］竟，居然

lj.lj_ly: Peter cooked dinner—fillet steak and champagne, no less.
lj.lj_ls: 彼得居然做出了饭——里脊扒和香槟酒。

lj.lj_ly: He had a less than favorable view of the matter.
lj.lj_ls: 他对那种事情根本不抱好感

lj.lj_ly: I'm not blaming anyone, much less you.
lj.lj_ls: 我根本就没有责怪任何人，更不用说你了

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English lǣssa, of Germanic origin; related to Old Frisian lēssa, from an Indo-European root shared by Greek loisthos 'last'

encyclopedia.content: 名称：less 使用权限：所有使用者 ，是不可数名词 使用方式： less [Option] filename 说明： less 的作用与 more 十分相似，都可以用来浏览文字档案的内容，不同的是 less 允许使用者往回卷动 以浏览已经看过的部份，同时因为 less 并未在一开始就读入整个档案，因此在遇上大型档案的开启时，会比一般的文书编辑器(如 vi)来的快速。 less 命令选项及其说明 “LESS”手术 ”LESS手术“ (Laparo－Endoscopic Single－site Surgery

entry.tran: （数量）较小（或少）的；更小（或少）的（前面可用a little，a lot，a bit，far和much等修饰）
entry.def: You use less to indicate that there is a smaller amount of something than before or than average. You can use 'a little', 'a lot',  'a bit', 'far', and 'much' in front of less.

example.ex: People should eat less fat to reduce the risk of heart disease.
example.tran: 人们应该减少脂肪摄入，以降低患心脏病的危险。

example.ex: ...a dishwasher that uses less water and electricity than older machines...
example.tran: 较旧式机器省水省电的洗碗机

entry.tran: （用在数字或数量前）少于，低于，比…少
entry.def: You use less than before a number or amount to say that the actual number or amount is smaller than this.

example.ex: Motorways actually cover less than 0.1 percent of the countryside...
example.tran: 高速公路的实际覆盖面积还不到农村地区的0.1%。

example.ex: Less than a half hour later he returned upstairs.
example.tran: 不到半个小时，他又跑上楼来。

entry.tran: （某一特性的程度与以往或一般情况相比）较轻地，较差地
entry.def: You use less to indicate that something or someone has a smaller amount of a quality than they used to or than is average or usual.

example.ex: I often think about those less fortunate than me...
example.tran: 我经常想到那些没我这么幸运的人。

example.ex: Other amenities, less commonly available, include a library and exercise room...
example.tran: 还有一些不太常有的设施，包括图书馆和健身房。

entry.tran: 不像…（更像…）；与其说…（倒不如说…）
entry.def: If you say that something is less one thing than another, you mean that it is like the second thing rather than the first.

example.ex: At first sight it looked less like a capital city than a mining camp...
example.tran: 乍看上去，它不像是首府，更像是矿工村。

example.ex: Trades union leadership in those days was less a career than a vocation.
example.tran: 那时候的工会领导与其说是一份职业，倒不如说是一种使命。

entry.def: If you do something less than before or less than someone else, you do it to a smaller extent or not as often.

example.ex: We are eating more and exercising less...
example.tran: 我们吃得多了，锻炼却少了。

example.ex: I see less of any of my friends than I used to.
example.tran: 我见所有朋友都比以前少了。

entry.tran: （用于否定句后）遑论，更何况，更不用说
entry.def: You use the expressions still less ,much less, and even less after a negative statement in order to introduce and emphasize a further statement, and to make it negative too.

example.ex: I never talked about it, still less about her...
example.tran: 我从来没说起过这事，更没有提起过她。

example.ex: The boy didn't have a girlfriend, much less a wife.
example.tran: 这小伙子连女朋友都没有，更不用提老婆了。

entry.tran: （用在数字或数量前）扣除，减去
entry.def: When you are referring to amounts, you use less in front of a number or quantity to indicate that it is to be subtracted from another number or quantity already mentioned.

example.ex: ...Boyton Financial Services Fees: £750, less £400...
example.tran: 博伊顿金融服务费：750英镑，扣除400英镑

example.ex: Company car drivers will pay between ten and twenty five percent, less tax.
example.tran: 公司的司机要支付10%到25%，从中扣除税款。

entry.def: You use less and less to say that something is becoming smaller all the time in degree or amount.

example.ex: The couple seem to spend less and less time together...
example.tran: 两口子在一起的时间似乎越来越少。

example.ex: She sounded less and less eager to return to Ireland...
example.tran: 听她话音，她回爱尔兰的热情似乎日渐消退。

entry.def: You use less than to say that something does not have a particular quality. For example, if you describe something as less than perfect, you mean that it is not perfect at all.

example.ex: Her greeting was less than enthusiastic...
example.tran: 她的问候一点都不热情。

example.ex: Her advice has frequently been less than wholly helpful.
example.tran: 她的建议往往毫无帮助。

entry.tran: （对某事物或某人的重要性表示惊讶或钦佩）竟然，居然
entry.def: You can use no less as a way of expressing surprise or admiration at the importance of something or someone.

example.ex: He had returned to England in an aircraft carrier no less...
example.tran: 他竟然坐航空母舰回的英格兰。

example.ex: Who wrote the screenplay from Patricia Highsmith's book? Raymond Chandler, no less.
example.tran: 帕特里夏·海史密斯那本书是谁改编成剧本的？雷蒙德·钱德勒呀，厉害。

entry.tran: （对某一数目之大表示惊奇）多达
entry.def: You use no less than before an amount to indicate that the amount is larger than you expected.

example.ex: No less than 35 per cent of the country is protected in the form of parks and nature sanctuaries...
example.tran: 该国多达35%的地区以公园和自然保护区的形式受到保护。

example.ex: He is lined up for no less than four US television interviews.
example.tran: 多达4家美国电视媒体排期邀请他上节目接受采访。

means.word_mean: 1. (comparative of `little' usually used with mass nouns) a quantifier meaning not as great in amount or degree;

sentences.sentence: "less time to spend with the family"
"no less a person than the king himself"

means.word_mean: 4. (nonstandard in some uses but often idiomatic with measure phrases) fewer;
1. used to form the comparative of some adjectives and adverbs;

example.en: I could care less what happens.
example.zh: 不管发生什么，我都不在乎。

example.en: So you're late. I couldn't care less.
example.zh: 这么说你迟到了。我没注意。

auth_sentence.content: In a country ravaged by civil war no less.
auth_sentence.res_content: In a country ravaged by civil war no less.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In a country ravaged by civil war no less.

auth_sentence.content: Paine escaped to France but others were less fortunate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Paine escaped to France but others were less fortunate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Paine escaped to France but others were less fortunate.

auth_sentence.content: But i find the issues to be less distracting.
auth_sentence.res_content: But i find the issues to be less distracting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But i find the issues to be less distracting.

means.word_mean: 较少的, 更少的 （与不可数名词连用）

sentences.en: The firm has less money and fewer staff than last year.
sentences.cn: 公司的资金和人员都比去年少了。

sentences.en: He has less money than ever.
sentences.cn: 他从来没有过这样少的钱。

sentences.en: I received less money than the others did.
sentences.cn: 我比别人收到的钱少。

sentences.en: The doctor advises me to eat less meat.
sentences.cn: 医生劝我少吃肉。

sentences.en: Statistics show that people now drink less beer than they used to, and smoke fewer cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 统计数字表明, 人们现在比过去喝啤酒少了, 而且烟抽也少了。

sentences.en: I love the country, but I have less opportunity of seeing it.
sentences.cn: 我热爱乡村, 但我几乎没有机会见到它。

sentences.en: Less people go to church than before.
sentences.cn: 上教堂的人比以前少些。

sentences.en: Less noise, please!
sentences.cn: 请不要大声吵闹！

sentences.en: It cost less money than I expected.
sentences.cn: 它比我预料的要便宜。

sentences.en: The movie had less success than expected.
sentences.cn: 影片没有获得预期的成功。

sentences.en: We got there in less than four hours.
sentences.cn: 我们用了不到4个小时就到了那里。

sentences.en: Less people study Latin today than formerly.
sentences.cn: 现在学习拉丁语的人比以前少。

sentences.en: Nothing in this shop is less than ￡10.
sentences.cn: 这家商店的东西没有低于10英镑的。

means.word_mean: 较少, 较小,更少地, 少,没那么多

sentences.en: Let's speak less and listen more.
sentences.cn: 咱们少讲多听吧。

sentences.en: I read much less now than I did at school.
sentences.cn: 我现在看书远比我上学时少。

sentences.en: With their children growing up, these mothers have become less involved with their families.
sentences.cn: 随着孩子长大成人, 这些母亲受家庭拖累就少些。

sentences.en: He was less known than his brother.
sentences.cn: 他不如他哥哥出名。

sentences.en: I hope the next train will be less crowded than this one.
sentences.cn: 我希望下趟火车不会像这趟这么挤。

sentences.en: I was less surprised as I had had this sort of experience.
sentences.cn: 因为我有过这样的经验, 所以并不感到怎么惊奇。

sentences.en: Try and speak less indistinctly.
sentences.cn: 想法子说得清楚些。

sentences.en: Tomatoes are everywhere in summer but less so in winter.
sentences.cn: 夏天到处都有西红柿, 冬天却不是这样。

jushi.english: The firm has less money and fewer staff than last year.
jushi.chinese: 公司的资金和人员都比去年少了。

jushi.english: I received less money than the others did.
Statistics show that people now drink less beer than they used to, and smoke fewer cigarettes.
jushi.chinese: 统计数字表明,人们现在比过去喝啤酒少了,而且烟抽也少了。
